channel.title: Camaro Concept
channel.description: Heres my last model in Blender before I switch over to Maya. Enjoy; and let the criticism begin. [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/CamaroRender.jpg[/img] Please note that the only reason behind the scene is so that its not just a blank render with a car in it. Its there to show the material of the car properly. No comments on the scene please.

item.title: Camaro Concept
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Photorealism is very possible in Blender. You just have to know how to use it.

Same criticisms as everyone else though. And the overall shape feels wrong. Mainly the windows and roof part of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Camaro Concept
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:4, topic:357119”]Metal materials need some work, particularly on the rims and the grill at the front, the tyres need a more distinct design put in.

On the geometry side of things, I would’ve thought the rims need to be inset into the wheels a little so it doesn’t just look like one object? Other than that I’d say geometry’s perfect.

ps. is photorealism actually possible in blender? :|[/quote]
I’d say no, one reason I’m quitting on Blender is I’m not happy with its rendering capabilities.

Read full topic

item.title: Camaro Concept
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Metal materials need some work, particularly on the rims and the grill at the front, the tyres need a more distinct design put in.

On the geometry side of things, I would’ve thought the rims need to be inset into the wheels a little so it doesn’t just look like one object? Other than that I’d say geometry’s perfect.

ps. is photorealism actually possible in blender?

Read full topic

item.title: Camaro Concept
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Nice modeling, but the tires could be better, and fix the ugly material.

Read full topic

item.title: Camaro Concept
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

My dad bought one of these a few days ago, great car.

You’re modeling looks good but you need to kill what screams “paper thin” or “plastic” on the model.

Read full topic
